author: remm
msg: - The recent change to the caching in StandardStore.grantPermission()
would add the granted permission twice if enumeratePermissions() did
- Patch submitted by Christopher Lenz <cmlenz at gmx.de>

author: juergen
msg: 1) do not print a stacktrace in a pre_condition failed situation
2) make sure the transaction is aborted in case of an error

author: juergen
msg: if an e.g.delete operation on a non existing resource is tried the response code is now not packed in a 207 any more.

author: juergen
msg: a timeout of 0 seconds is possible now.

author: dirkv
msg: use normal database url with jdbc: prefix
